output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly refers to Marcel Ciolacu multiple times and promotes him as presidential candidate.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement targeting a large audience (100,001-500,000 people).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral objective: - Explicitly promotes Marcel Ciolacu for President - Uses phrases like "calea sigură pentru România" - Encourages voting for him in the upcoming election - Presents his qualities as a potential president
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content. It's clearly promotional material praising a candidate.
6. Personal opinion: While structured as an opinion, this is a paid advertisement meant to influence voters, going beyond personal expression.
The post is clearly electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria under Article 36(7): a) Directly refers to candidate Marcel Ciolacu b) Used during campaign period c) Has clear electoral objective d) Exceeds journalistic information limits

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Paid advertisement reaching large audience - Clear call to support candidate - Contains campaign messaging - Uses emotional appeal to influence voters
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propagandă electorală (ID postare Facebook: 419482617925440) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Materialul promovat reprezintă propagandă electorală explicită pentru candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU, având scop electoral clar definit, adresându-se publicului larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook și Instagram, cu mesaje precum "Marcel Ciolacu, calea sigură pentru România" și îndemnuri clare de susținere a candidatului la funcția de președinte. Postarea a fost promovată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.
